Name 2023 Award ACM SIGSPATIAL Lifetime Impact AwardFor outstanding technical achievements and dedicated service in ACM SIGSPATIAL 2022 Award Pierre Bézier Award, Solid Modeling Association 2021 Award Pioneer, Solid Modelling Association 2020 Award Distinguished Career in Computer Science, Washington Academy of Sciences 2013 UMD UMD Univ Maryland Distinguished University Professor 2012 Award ACM Paris Kanellakis Theory and Practice AwardFor fundamental contributions to the development of multidimensional spatial data structures and indexing. 1996 Fellow ACM ACM FellowFor research and contributions in the area of hierarchical data structures for applications in spatial data bases for computer graphics, image processing, geographic information systems, and robotics. 1996 Fellow IAPR IAPRFor contributions to hierarchical data structures for image analysis and representation 1991 Fellow IEEE IEEE FellowThe area of hierarchical data structures for applications in spatial databases for computer graphics and image processing.
